txt.en: Fight the cold-drake horde
Mission: The Zhélruka Clan, Chapter 9
'Ah ha! Svalnath, the beast is no more! Let us take its head and mount it upon the walls of Vérnozal so that all will know the might and the great deeds of the Zhélruka!'
Defeat Svalnath
<rgb=#FF0000>Prince Ingór must survive</rgb>
'Svalnath is near. Come, this way!'
'Ah ha! The beast is no more!'
'Svalnath is near. Come, this way!'
The mighty drake, Svalnath, spawn of Hrímil Frost-heart has appeared!
Svalnath has been slain!
Fight the cold-drake horde.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>If Prince Ingór is missing, and the Call Prince Ingór skill is not available, try using the /pet release command.</rgb>
Prince Ingór has fallen in battle!
Prince Ingór wishes to hunt the great frost-drake, Svalnath, and to bring great honour to the Zhélruka clan.
Defeat Svalnath.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>If Prince Ingór is missing, and the Call Prince Ingór skill is not available, try using the /pet release command.</rgb>
Prince Ingór has fallen in battle!
<rgb=#FF0000>Prince Ingór must survive</rgb>
Use the summoning horn at the beginning of the mission to summon Prince Ingór to your side.
Pick up the summoning horn
Use the Call Prince Ingór skill and talk to Ingór
You should talk to Prince Ingór.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>If Prince Ingór is missing, and the Call Prince Ingór skill is not available, try using the /pet release command.</rgb>
